review: My tv has one of those apps. It doesn't remember what you last watched. I'd sit down with dinner and start clicking away and eating. By the time dinner was half gone I'd get to the last tv show, I think, I watched to find the next episode. With the fire box, I sit down to eat, and before I finish the first mouthful of food I'm watching the next episode. Now instead of watching just one series because that was all I could remember which episode I was on, I can watch 9 or so and the box remembers where I left of one each one. I love variety.It remembers your recently watched and also has your amazon watch list. Navigation with the control is very simple and fast. I like browsing titles but the voice search is great too. The remote seems to not need line of site. I can lay in bed and have the remote under the blankets and still operate it.
